entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Shaunavon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:54 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eastend 10:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -21.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -24.3°C
Wind: SSW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 14 except minus 7 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14 except minus 7 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning except plus 4 near the Alberta border. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight with risk of freezing rain. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight then becoming west 50 gusting to 70. Temperature rising to zero by morning except plus 4 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then clearing. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
